stimulusHtml:
Listen to the excerpt.

The notation above is correct, but in the version you hear there is a voice-leading error. Which of the following statements accurately describes the error heard?
choicesHtml: Parallel fifth between the soprano and bass.
Parallel octaves between the soprano and bass
There are more than three consecutive intervals of a third between the outer voices.
There are more than three consecutive intervals of a sixth between the outer voices.
